intro.p: Here you can learn more about me and check out projects in my portfolio.

spotlight_1.title: Rocketseat NLWs
spotlight_1.text: Rocketseat is a coding school. Periodically they organize an event called Next Level Week (NLW). During the event, we code a web-based application using the latest technologies. I loved the tech stack used during the event. It got me interested in learning web development.

spotlight_2.title: NLW #01
spotlight_2.text: The first NLW brought a project about recycling material. We created a website where people could register recyclable material collection points. We also developed an app to list the closest points and the materials they collect.

spotlight_3.title: NLW eSports
spotlight_3.text: In this project, we've developed a web interface and a mobile app that connects users searching for a partner to play a game. Using React and React Native for the front end and Express for the back end.

about_3.title: Work History
about_3.text: I'm currently looking for my first job. I want opportunities to expand my knowledge and skills in my fields of interest. I'm curious, willing, and passionate about technology and business.

about_4.title: Where do I work from
about_4.text: I'm working from Goiânia, GO - Brazil. Since my graduation is in Goiânia, I'm only open to remote opportunities or offices located here.

contact.title: Get in touch
contact.text: This website is my resume. If you think I could add value to your team, please send me a message.
